message: This is a great opportunity to get a product at a fantastic price! I'm offering it to you for $100, which is a steal considering its usual market value. It's a one-time offer, so you shouldn't miss out on this chance to get a deal. What do you say? Will you take it?
I'll take it, but I'm doing it for the potential gain, not because I think it's a good deal.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on this one! I want to remind you that every product has its unique characteristics, and sometimes it's the unexpected ones that surprise us. Will you take another chance and see what this product has to offer?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, Alice. I'll pass on this one.
